name: BananaManJoe Sr.
description:
What is Banana-Man-Joe Sr.!?

A VOICE ACTED action shooter made for ludum dare 50 with the theme "Delay The Inevitable"

The movement, narrative and feel are the key focus of this game. Delve into the pretty palleted world of Banana Man Joe Sr. 

Order yourself a banana pizza, slaughter Bananan'ts with your Fritter-Splitter™ and ignore the allure of the decadent  POYO PLUSH!

Day 1 fixes:
- Added mouse Lock
- Final dialogue NPC name-reveal fix
- Battle music no longer has gap
- Bloom dimmed
- UI hint disabled during battle
